name: Masterquest The Three Catateers
description:
Description

 Masterquest The Three Catateers is a cooperative platformer game that has lava ball damage and you have enemies mostly on all the levels and one every level you have to defeat all the enemies to get the key to go to next level.

This game is in early access, that is playable. But i still need to add more features to this game , such as boss and attack for the boss and add my enemies sprites

 release dates:

23/06/17

price:
free

Game Features:

-Platformer

-Two Player (Cooperative)

-Interactive Environment

-Weapon Attack

-Enemies

Price: Free

Platform: Windows

Bio

i am Darshan Shah, student game developer upcoming artist from Media Design School. I intend to be a 3D game developer.
